document.full_text: after the september 11, 2001 attacks, muslims and arabs were illegally targeted and detained by the u.s. government without proper suspicion of ties to terrorism, a rights lawyer told a new york judge on friday.
document.title: judge hears arguments in muslim abuse case
lines_and_colors: after the september 11, 2001 attacks, muslims and arabs were illegally targeted and detained by the u.s. government without proper suspicion of ties to terrorism, a rights lawyer told a new york judge on friday.
